text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  15. Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Gasse sind zu verkauffen:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>
    <NOTE>mit viel schönen Kupfern</NOTE>
    <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1632</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>IT. Tomes</VOLUME>
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1744</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8v6</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1684</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Eyusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>hora Hebr. in fct. Rom. Cor.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1679</YEAR>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Jena</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1727</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Walchn</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1733</YEAR>
    <VOLUME>11. Tomi</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>von 50. Carten</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"Corrections made:
1) Added XML declaration (<?xml ...?>).
2) Fixed corrupted/garbled character sequences and OCR errors: 'Augustiner-Ga\u221a\u00fc' -> 'Augustiner-Gasse'; 'sch\u221a\u2202nen' -> 'schönen'; 'Jen\u221a\u00a7' -> 'Jena'; 'Frantz\u221a\u2202sischer' -> 'Französischer'; '4t\u221a\u2264' -> '4to'.
3) Wrapped the phrase 'mit viel schönen Kupfern' in a <NOTE> element to avoid stray punctuation/text inside <BIBL>.
4) Fixed malformed TITLE tag '<TITLE=in ...>' to a proper <TITLE> element and preserved its text.
5) Escaped the ampersand in the Clericus title to '&'.
6) Integrated the stray word 'von' into the <VOLUME> element for the atlas (removed stray text outside tags).

Total of 10 fixes (character fixes, tag fixes, structural additions, and escaping)."}

<ITEM>

    <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>

  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE>

</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
Corrections made:
1) Added XML declaration (<?xml ...?>).
2) Fixed corrupted/garbled character sequences and OCR errors: 'Augustiner-Ga\u221a\u00fc' -> 'Augustiner-Gasse'; 'sch\u221a\u2202nen' -> 'schönen'; 'Jen\u221a\u00a7' -> 'Jena'; 'Frantz\u221a\u2202sischer' -> 'Französischer'; '4t\u221a\u2264' -> '4to'.
3) Wrapped the phrase 'mit viel schönen Kupfern' in a <NOTE> element to avoid stray punctuation/text inside <BIBL>.
4) Fixed malformed TITLE tag '<TITLE=in ...>' to a proper <TITLE> element and preserved its text.
5) Escaped the ampersand in the Clericus title to '&'.
6) Integrated the stray word 'von' into the <VOLUME> element for the atlas (removed stray text outside tags).

Total of 10 fixes (character fixes, tag fixes, structural additions, and escaping).
